Protecting the Silos & Smokestacks National Heritage Area Act
To repeal the funding authorization sunset and the total funding cap for America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
This bill redesignates the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership in Iowa as the Silos & Smokestacks National Heritage Area.
The bill extends indefinitely the authority of the Department of Agriculture to provide grants or other assistance for the heritage area.
The bill eliminates the limitation on the total amount that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
